survey_q2: What was your diet like today?
survey_q3: How was your energy use at home?
survey_q3_placeholder: e.g., Used the AC, kept lights on...

guide_description: Learn how to earn points, redeem rewards, and play fair.
guide_recycling_description: Earn points by scanning an item and verifying your disposal with a photo. Points are awarded based on the environmental impact of the material.
guide_survey_description: Complete a daily survey to get provisional points. Verify with a receipt for a massive bonus!

item3.title: Receipt Verification Bonus
item3.desc: (Scan a receipt to verify your day)

guide_survey_footer: The provisional reward formula is `sustainabilityScore * 0.5`. The penalty is a sliding scale based on how much your footprint exceeds 30kg.
guide_redemption_description: Use your hard-earned points to get real-world discounts and rewards from our partners.
guide_rules_description: To keep the community fair and the rewards meaningful, please follow these rules.
guide_rules_list: All submissions must be genuine and represent your own actions, taken in real-time.
Do not submit photos from your gallery, screenshots, or AI-generated images.
Each recycling act and daily survey should only be logged once. Our system has checks for duplicate submissions.
Attempting to manipulate the points system by submitting fraudulent images will result in a **-50 point penalty** and may lead to account suspension.
guide_howto_recycle_step1: From the main menu, tap the '{button}' button.
guide_howto_recycle_step2: Use your camera to scan the item's packaging. Our AI will identify the material.
guide_howto_recycle_step3: Tap the '{button}' button. This will open your camera again.
guide_howto_recycle_step4: Take a clear photo of yourself (or your hand) placing the item into a recycling bin.
guide_howto_recycle_step5: Our AI will verify your action. Points are awarded instantly upon successful verification!
guide_howto_footprint_title: How to Verify Your Carbon Footprint:
guide_howto_footprint_step1: From the main menu, tap the '{button}' button and complete the daily survey.
guide_howto_footprint_step2: Receive your initial analysis and provisional points.
guide_howto_footprint_step3: Tap the '{button}' button to open the camera.
guide_howto_footprint_step4: Scan a receipt from today that reflects your daily activities (e.g., groceries, transport tickets).
guide_howto_footprint_step5: If the receipt is validated, your provisional points will be replaced with the full points plus a 100% bonus!
